title: Changing tag
body: With the  clubs I would love to know if there is a feature that allows you to change your club tag without having to make a whole new club. I goofed up and want to change my club tag but don't want to have to reinvite the other 20 people in the club. Thanks :D

replies.body:
Ther isn't currently a feature that allows you to change either your club tag or name without having to recreate the club entirely. Clubs are a fairly new feature to League, though, so it's possible that you'll be able to rename your clubs in the future.

Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=B1lIA42Q,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-23T03:04:51.333+0000)
>
> Ther isn't currently a feature that allows you to change either your club tag or name without having to recreate the club entirely. Clubs are a fairly new feature to League, though, so it's possible that you'll be able to rename your clubs in the future.
